author: perrotta
body:
#### PR description:

Fix the arguments of  a LogWarning by replacing pfCandidate with jetConstituent
The issue was originally spotted by the static analyzer

While there, I also replaced a few do loops with range based ones, which ends up in more compact and readable lines of code

@rappoccio @mbluj @swozniewski 

#### PR validation:

A few workflows work till completion
title: Fix BoostedTauSeedsProducer.cc by replacing jetConstituent instead of pfCandidate in a LogWarning
